posts.post_content: They printed this card to reference the gaffe on Hyalopterous Lemure's art. The original card wasn't popular, but it was notable that the artist mistook what was supposed to be an evil spirit for a flying monkey.
posts.html:
They printed this card to reference the gaffe on Hyalopterous Lemure's art. The original card wasn't popular, but it was notable that the artist mistook what was supposed to be an evil spirit for a flying monkey.

posts.post_content:
Time Spiral was how many cards over a regular set's size and they used up an additional slot to print this guy? Was the original way more popular than I realize? I love Time Spiral, but if viewed from an objective distance...  
Oh and cut Richard Thomas some slack he thought the art de\*\*\*ion actually called for winged lemurs.
